sentences.en: All this fuss is because Carol is having a bad hair day.
sentences.cn: 就因为卡萝尔今天不太顺心，所以弄得大家鸡飞狗跳。

sentences.en: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
sentences.cn: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

sentences.en: Carol fussed about getting me a drink.
sentences.cn: 卡萝尔忙乎着给我弄杯饮料。

sentences.en: He accused Diana of making an unnecessary fuss.
sentences.cn: 他责备黛安娜没必要那么大惊小怪。

sentences.en: He accused me of making a great fuss about trivialities.
sentences.cn: 他指责我为丁点琐事大惊小怪。

sentences.en: He does what he's told without any fuss.
sentences.cn: 他不声不响地按照吩咐办事。

sentences.en: He was offered a generous pension provided he left without a fuss.
sentences.cn: 他如果一声不吭地离开，就会获得一笔丰厚的养老金。

sentences.en: I wish you’d stop fussing - I’ll be perfectly all right.
sentences.cn: 我希望你别再瞎操心了——我会很好的。

sentences.en: I'll never make a fuss about the trifles with him.
sentences.cn: 我不会在这件小事上与他计较.

sentences.en: James said he’d better be getting back or there’d be a fuss .
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯说他最好回来，否则就会有人小题大做了。

sentences.en: James said he’d better be getting back or there’d be a fuss.

sentences.en: Lawson writes so well: in plain English, without fuss or affectation.
sentences.cn: 劳森写得很好：英文通俗易懂，朴实无华又不矫揉造作。

sentences.en: My mother makes a fuss of me every time I come home.
sentences.cn: 我每次回家,母亲总对我体贴备至.

sentences.en: Stop all this fuss and do your homework.
sentences.cn: 别大惊小怪了,去做你的家庭作业吧.

sentences.en: Stop fussing around and find something useful to do!
sentences.cn: 别瞎忙活了，找点有用的事干！

sentences.en: The old lady soon got into a fuss.
sentences.cn: 老妇人很快就紧张起来.

sentences.en: The Steamatic enables you to clean any carpet with the minimum of fuss .
sentences.cn: 蒸汽清洁器可以让你轻轻松松地清洁地毯。

sentences.en: Their ambitions are to bash out good grub with minimal fuss.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标就是尽可能省劲地大量供应可口饭菜。

sentences.en: There wasn't a great fuss when I chucked her.
sentences.cn: 我把她甩掉的时候，她没哭也没闹。

sentences.en: Those customers who have kicked up a fuss have received refunds.
sentences.cn: 那些大吵大闹的顾客得到了退款。

sentences.en: When I arrived my nephews made a big fuss of me.
sentences.cn: 我到达的时候，侄子们围着我嘘寒问暖。
